title: Set up a project with SEGGER Embedded Studio
description: Configure SEGGER Embedded Studio for use with nRF Connect SDK

steps.title: Start SEGGER Embedded Studio
description: Go to the location where you installed SEGGER Embedded Studio

steps.title: Open a project
steps.description: Click the file menu *File > Open nRF Connect SDK Project...*

steps.title: Choose paths
description: Choose the paths for the different parameters
**CMakeLists.txt** should be a link to the projects file for your project, i.e. *<sourcecode_root>/ncs/nrf/samples/bluetooth/hids_mouse/CMakeLists.txt*
**Build Directory** should be the location to build to, i.e. *<sourcecode_root>/ncs/nrf/samples/bluetooth/hids_mouse/build*

**Board Directory** should be the location of the board description of your development kit, i.e. *<sourcecode_root>/ncs/nrf/boards/arm/nrf52840_pca20041* or *<sourcecode_root>/ncs/zephyr/boards/arm/nrf51_pca10028*

steps.title: GNU ARM Embedded Toolchain Directory
description: **GNU ARM Embedded Toolchain Directory** should be the location where you installed your GNU ARM Embedded Toolchain, i.e. *c:\gnuarmemb*

steps.title: Open project
steps.description: Click OK to open the project
